title: Freapp - Free App of the Day
creator: Freapp Lab

extendedInfo.description: Freapp is just the tool you need to give a boost to your Android phone!With Freapp you can browse and download the best FREE Apps and Games daily that we personally select for you via Google Play and: Discover which Apps or Games change prices every day;Create a watch-list of your preferred Apps and Games;Manage apps and check the stats from your mobile device;Save space in your phone by using the Freapp "make space" function.Freapp is now one of the most comprehensive Apps on Google Play and allows you to download and manage all the free content you desire!Freapp's main features:- CERTIFIED CONTENT: the ability to select and download only apps and games that have been previously tested and reviewed by our team;- CUSTOMIZED COLLECTIONS of Applications and Games to better find the apps you are interested in;- DISCOUNTED CONTENT:  find apps and games with reduced prices;- INSTALLED APP MANAGER: scan the apps you have already installed on your phone and check the related stats;- MAKE SPACE: uninstall directly from Freapp any unnecessary apps that occupy your phone memory;- WISHLIST: remember and highlight any apps that you like;- FACEBOOK CONNECT AND "INVITE FRIENDS": share your app with friends and also see what apps they use;- POWER SEARCH: browse the apps you want (with the added possibility to include "paid" apps within the results);- DAILY/WEEKLY OFFER NOTIFICATION: in order to not lose out any awesome offer;More news! Freapp is now integrated online at www.freapp.com Here you can check out which Apps your friends on Facebook use & can invite them to see yours! Comment on the Apps you like, ask your friends for tips and see whatâs hot on Google Play.Freapp is now your  reference point for the FANTASTIC WORLD OF FREE CONTENT!

reviews.title: Solid app
reviews.comment: The UI is comfortable, and the selection is decent. The best feature is the notifications, they are informative enough that I can usually tell if the daily freebie is one that I would be interested in without having to open the app.
reviews.author: Morgen Peschke

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Best app
reviews.author: Abusahal Sahal

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very cool
reviews.author: Edward Karrat

reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Barun Chattaraj

reviews.title: summary
reviews.comment: yeah thankz
reviews.author: ice arcega

reviews.title: Oh hey! It\'s an already free app.
reviews.comment: There are a ton of already free apps. I don\'t need another one to point me to them. This was more disappointing than Appgratis.
reviews.author: Aaron Whitman

reviews.title: Nothing\'s free here at all
reviews.comment: I installed today\'s free app which is spotify with premium content unlocked. But Spotify clearly mentions on the app page its a 48 hour trial. When I installed I was asked to upgrade as I had already used the free 48 hour trial a while ago. Freapp shouldn\'t make tall claims about getting premium apps free. Its a waste of time, I\'d rather stick to appgratis.
reviews.author: Prakash C

reviews.title: If you like games this is the app that you want to get
reviews.comment: I love it a game every day for free you can\'t beat it
reviews.author: Jimmy Howard

reviews.title: Terrible App
reviews.comment: This app is awful, it keeps ringing and woke me up while I was sleeping and if people Wanted the apps on here they can just look it up. What a terrible app if there were less than one star I would select it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Love the app.. the idea.. the UI .. everything it does what it says perfectly and no bugs so far. My only complaint is the lists and categories for apps and games should be a lot more :) add some. Or do they change frequently? If not add more apps and games.  1 last thing my recommendation would be a widget. Ty 5 star for encouragment.
reviews.author: Ara Poladian

reviews.title: crap
reviews.comment: it stated rdio is free for premium, aftr download it say 13 day trail only ..... why state if you not giving.
reviews.author: Harsain Singh

reviews.title: FreeApp
reviews.comment: What a terrible app. Its called free app of the day but the app that was featured was a free one anyway. Not sure if it means it features only free apps or paid ones that go free. Also the app UI is awful and full of ads with hardly any room on the screen to see what your reading.
reviews.author: Gavin Vaughan

reviews.title: Not helpful at all
reviews.comment: Downloaded it today hoping to get some cool paid app for free.  Well, the deal of the day is \"What\'s The Phrase Free\".  Duh!  It\'s already free.  This app is nothing but an advertising vehicle for apps that are already free.  I checked the featured apps from previous days and they are also already free too.     Don\'t bother installing this adware.
reviews.author: C Liu

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this app today already got a lot of new apps and games through it... But if you want paid apps free download appgratis...
reviews.author: Ahmad Moukalled

reviews.comment: Great App just needs more free games & apps
reviews.author: Connor Renshaw

reviews.title: Thank u helpfull
reviews.comment: Do more ambious

reviews.title: App of the day ?
reviews.comment: Does it shows up the Free app of the day? I dont think so.. its just suggestings apps only..  Update: Does ot shows the paid app that becomes free for the day. ?

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I tried \"Today\'s free app\" it sucked.This is way better because u have more to choose from.The othet app only gave u 1 for the day and the choice usually sucked and they were free anyways.I know that most of these are also free but u have a list of games,books etc..I didnt even know half of these apps exsisted.Thanks again
reviews.author: Elizabeth Robertson
